Class ncsa.hdf.h4toh5lib.exceptions.H45Exception

    |
    +----java.lang.Throwable

            +----java.lang.Exception
                    |
                    +----ncsa.hdf.h4toh5lib.exceptions.H45Exception
public class H45Exception
extends java.lang.Exception

The class H45Exception returns errors from the Java HDF4 to 5 Interface.

Two sub-classes of H45Exception are defined:

  1. H45LibraryException -- errors raised the libh4toh5 library code
  2. H45JavaException -- errors raised the java-h4toh5 Java wrapper code

detailMessage
 

H45Exception()
Constructs an H45Exception with no specified detail message.
H45Exception(String)
Constructs an HDF5Exception with the specified detail message.

Returns the detail message of this exception
